tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to an Integer Overflow when processing UTF-8 strings longer than 65535 bytes, causing incorrect encoding and potential data leakage between MQTT packet fields. Attackers can exploit this to corrupt packets or inject unexpected data into message bodies.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/eclipse/paho.mqtt.golang` library to the patch version.
